definition: surname Qi/also used in place names
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

discrimination (against sb)/also written 歧視|歧视
Zhao Qi (-201 BC), early Han commentator on Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3]

sentences.english: I suggest that you eat gold Bifidobacterium, I also like kids.
sentences.chinese: 我建議你喫金雙岐，我寶寶也是這樣的。

sentences.english: Finally I struggle wasalighting, eagerly hurries back Huangqi, comforts the wife.
sentences.chinese: 最後我掙扎着下了車，急於趕回黃岐，安撫妻子。
